Verses: 1 ennode Pesina Thoodhan Thirumbivandhu Niththirai Pannugira Oruvanai Ezhuppuvadhupol Ennai Ezhuppi:

2 nee Kaangiradhu Ennavendru Kettaar; Adharku Naan: Idho, Muzhuvadhum Ponninaal Seyyappatta Kuththuvilakkaik Kaangiren; Adhin Uchchiyil Adhin Kinnamum, Adhinmel Adhin Ezhu Agalgalum Adhin Uchchiyil Irukkira Agalgalukkuppogira Ezhu Kuzhaaigalum Irukkiradhu.
3 adhin Arugil Kinnaththirku Valadhupuramaaga Ondrum, Adharku Idadhupuramaaga Ondrum, Aaga Irandu Olivamarangal Irukkiradhu Endren.
4 naan Ennode Pesina Thoodhanai Nokki: Aandavane, Ivaigal Ennavendru Ketten.
5 ennode Pesina Thoodhan Marumozhiyaaga: Ivaigal Innadhendru Unakkuth Theriyaadhaa Endraar; Aandavane, Enakkuth Theriyaadhu Endren.

6 appozhudhu Avar: Serubaabelukku Sollappadugira Karththarudaiya Vaarththai Ennavendraal, Balaththinaalum Alla, Paraakkiramaththinaalum Alla, Ennudaiya Aaviyinaaleye Aagum Endru Senaigalin Karththar Sollugiraar.

7 periya Parvadhame, Nee Emmaaththiram? Serubaabelukku Munbaaga Nee Samaboomiyaavaai; Thalaikkallai Avan Konduvaruvaan; Adharkuk Kirubaiyundaavadhaaga, Kirubaiyundaavadhaaga Endru Aarpparippaargal Endraar.
8 pinnum Karththarudaiya Vaarththai Enakku Undaagi, Avar:
9 serubaabelin Kaigal Indha Aalayaththukku Asthibaarampottadhu; Avan Kaigale Idhai Mudiththuth Theerkkum; Adhinaal Senaigalin Karththar Ennai Ungalidaththirku Anuppinaarendru Arivaai.

10 arpamaana Aarambaththin Naalai Yaar Asattaipannalaam? Boomiyengum Sutrippaarkkiravaigalaagiya Karththarudaiya Ezhu Kangalum Serubaabelin Kaiyil Irukkira Thookkunoolai Sandhoshamaaip Paarkkiradhu Endraar.
11 pinbu Naan Avarai Nokki: Kuththuvilakkukku Valadhupuramaagavum Adharku Idadhupuramaagavum Irukkira Indha Irandu Olivamarangal Ennavendru Ketten.
12 marupadiyum Naan Avarai Nokki: Irandu Porkuzhaaigalin Vazhiyaaith Thongi, Ponniramaana Enneyaith Thangalilirundhu Irangappannugiravaigalaagiya Olivamarangalin Irandu Kilaigal Ennavendru Ketten.
13 adharku Avar: Ivaigal Innadhendru Unakkuth Theriyaadhaa Endraar; Aandavane, Enakkuth Theriyaadhu Endren.
14 appozhudhu Avar; Ivaigal Irandum Sarvalogaththukkum Aandavaraayirukkiravarin Samugaththil Nirkira Abishegam Petravargal Endraar.
